---
title: First long runs at polish peninsula Hel
thumb: https://scontent-frt3-1.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/e15/10859944_864609003560393_1893967049_n.jpg
---


December 2014 I spent my winter holidays on beautiful polish penisula Hel with my dog. We done together nice three long runs.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Two races in region to consider:
---------------------------------

* Maraton Północy (Bieg czterech latarni) [link](https://elektronicznezapisy.pl/event/997.html)

* Go To Hel (ultra run 80k and 120k) [link](http://gotohell.com.pl/)


first: 19 kilometers
---
